lead_paragraph: The request by Bakir Izetbegovic is likely to fan the simmering political tension in a region still torn by the war that broke up Yugoslavia in the 1990s.

headline.main: Muslim Leader in Bosnia Asks to Reopen Genocide Case Against Serbia
headline.print_headline: Reopening Is Sought Of Serbia Genocide Case
